verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: he will pull the United States out of the Iran nuclear deal , a 2015 agreement that capped over a decade of hostility between Tehran and the West]
President Donald Trump announced Tuesday he [V: will] pull the United States out of the Iran nuclear deal , a 2015 agreement that capped over a decade of hostility between Tehran and the West

President Donald Trump announced Tuesday [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: pull] [ARG1: the United States] [ARG2: out of the Iran nuclear deal , a 2015 agreement that capped over a decade of hostility between Tehran and the West]

President Donald Trump announced Tuesday he will pull the United States out of the Iran nuclear deal , [ARG0: a 2015 agreement] [R-ARG0: that] [V: capped] [ARG1: over a decade of hostility between Tehran and the West]
